alert.note: Alert for Lawrence (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 13 at 6:25PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Boyd, southeastern Lawrence, west central Cabell and northwestern Wayne Counties through 700 PM EDT... At 625 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Catlettsburg, or over Ashland, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Huntington, Ashland, Ironton, Coal Grove, Chesapeake, Proctorville, Kenova, Catlettsburg, Ceredo, South Point, Burlington, Bellefonte and Westwood. This includes the following highways... Interstate 64 in Kentucky between mile markers 189 and 191. Interstate 64 in West Virginia between mile markers 1 and 13. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
